GSD.product_version: versions from v5.8 to before v5.10.137
GSD.description:
usb: aspeed-vhub: Fix refcount leak bug in ast_vhub_init_desc()

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v5.10.137 by commit e6db5780c2bf6e23be7b315809ef349b4b4f2213, it was introduced in version v5.8 by commit 30d2617fd7ed052c30d1c21ddd4af4703d922be8. For more details please see the references link.
